description: This file defines a utility object StringUtils with methods to join and split strings, utilizing external helper objects JoinUtils and SplitUtils.

classes.name: StringUtils
classes.description: A utility object providing string join and split functionalities, delegating to external utils.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Converts a LinkedList into a String by delegating to JoinUtils.join.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a String into a LinkedList by delegating to SplitUtils.split.
